(as of Nov 30,2022 05:08:34 UTC – Details)


The GoSports 8’x8′ football net was developed to help QB’s of all abilities practice passing accuracy on their own. The net provides 3 distinct targets are various heights for improved throwing power and accuracy. The net is constructed from a tubular steel frame with a bow net style netting that can be setup in under 60 seconds. It also includes extended legs and metal Spikes to ensure it will never tip over. This is great for the backyard, on the field or even indoors in a gym. Improve your accuracy today with the GoSports football passing net.
ULTIMATE TRAINING AID: Perfect for players of all abilities for snapping, throwing, short pass, long pass drills and more
HUGE SIZE: 8′ x 8′ passing net with 3 target pockets simulating prime receiving areas
IMPROVE ACCURACY: Aids QBs and players in hitting their location with passes to improve in-game completion percentages
FOLDABLE SETUP: Reinforced bow frame with high density polyester netting and bonus storage carry case

Read more

FOOTBALL TRAINING AID

Coach and player approved! The GoSports Football Trainer Throwing Net is the ultimate training aid for all ages. Practice throwing and improve your precision skills by aiming at one of the three target nets. Great for snapping, throwing, short pass and long pass drills.

DURABLE NETTING

The GoSports Football Trainer Throwing Net is designed with quarterbacks in mind! It’s made with durable netting to withstand continuous throwing. Practice with confidence knowing that your net won’t break or rip upon impact.

INSTANT SETUP

Take with you to any football field or park! The practice net features a foldable bow frame that’s easy to assemble and disassemble. It also includes a carrying case for storage and travel.

Read more

SOLID CONSTRUCTION

MULTIPLE PRACTICE TARGETS

CHOOSE YOUR SIZE

Read more

Shop Other GoSports Products and Accessories

Find More Football Training Essentials!







Football Kicking Net
XL Heavy Duty Tackle Dummy
Perfect Catch Football Receiver Trainers
Football Kicking Tee
Combine Football 6 Pack
Brand GoSports GoSports GoSports GoSports GoSports
Key Features Practice net for practicing punts and placekicks. Includes sandbags and carrying case. Heavy-duty tackle dummy for safely simulating contact drills for a variety of sports or for martial arts training. Features an ultra dense foam core and tear proof composite leather surface. The red rubber pad on each catch trainer encourages players to catch with their fingertips instead of their palms, resulting in more consistent catches. Fits all hand sizes and prevents injury from missed catches. Metal place kicking stand for field goal kicks that features a soft non-stick rubber grip for holding any football. NCAA and NFHS size footballs for high school and college players . Includes 6 premium regulation size footballs, ball pump and mesh bag.
Dimensions 7’x4’ 4’x1’ one size 19”x17.5” regulation size
Accessories Included

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:22:04 UTC – Details)


Who says football has to stay on the field? With the Franklin Sports inflatable 3-hole football target set, Kids have everything they need to take your football practice to the next level, Whether you’re in your backyard, basement or at the beach. This set includes a manual hand air pump to use to inflate the (2) 7.25” footballs. The rotation molded footballs’ size and weight make them very versatile for indoor and outdoor play. They’re fun for all ages and abilities, and perfect for pre-pee wee football players (3-6 years old) or older players looking to improve their ball control and accuracy skills. The football target inflates to nearly 45″ Inches tall and has 3 target holes included, making it the perfect dynamic practice partner for QB football drills, whether you’re spiraling solo or passing with another player. To ensure that the inflatable football target doesn’t get blown away by your powerful arm, fill the smaller section on the bottom with water or sand before inflating the top section with the Air pump. Whether as an addition to your athletic equipment collection or as a birthday, holiday, or anytime gift, you’re sure to score a touchdown with the Franklin Sports inflatable 3-hole football target set.
Football on the go: The inflatable 3-hole football stores and travels easily, making it perfect for practice, throw-offs & pick-up games anywhere.
Practice & Recreational use: turn the basement, backyard, park or beach into your own football field. Or, set it up at your next birthday party or neighborhood gathering for some friendly competition.
Hours of fun: Whether you want to be the next greatest quarterback of all time or just have a good time, This set offers football fun for you, your family, and all your friends.
Sturdy construction: made of durable PVC to stand up to the strongest of throws and kicks. The water-filled base adds additional stability so when the target is knocked down it pops right back up.
Set includes: (1) 45” inflatable 3-hole football target with water-fillable base, (2) 7.25” rotationally molded PVC footballs, (1) sports ball hand air pump with needle

Read more

Warranty & Support

Price: $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 02:13:01 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Popdart Color
3 Blue/Green Swirl | 3 Purple/Yellow 3 Blue | 3 Green 3 Purple | 3 Yellow 3 Blue (Glow) | 3 Green (Glow)

Target Marker
Wigglenobber Target Marker Original Target Marker Original Target Marker Original Glow Target Marker

Carrying Bag with rules

Score Keeper on our website

✓

✓

✓

Play with up to 6 Players
Need this plus Original and Expansion Need this plus Expansion and PRO Need this plus Original and PRO Need this plus Expansion and PRO

Popdarts Decal

✓

Ruler printed on the carrying bag

✓

DETERMINE WHO GOES FIRST

Rock, Paper Scissors to determine who goes first.The winner chooses the first Target Marker location and the color of their team’s Popdarts.There are three Popdarts per player and they are made of a different color to distinguish between players.The game is played with two or more players.

CALL YOUR SHOT

To start a game, player one chooses a location with a smooth surface and places the Target Marker.Player one also calls the round parameters.Example: Player one places Target Marker on the countertop and says, “Throw standing from behind the couch.”

TAKE TURNS THROWING

Once the parameters are set, the player that placed the Target Marker throws the first Popdart.The players rotate throwing their Popdarts with the objective of landing on the Wigglenobber Target Marker or at least getting the closest to the Wigglnobber Target Marker.This continues until both players have thrown all their Popdarts.

HOW TO SCORE A ROUND

After both players have thrown all their Popdarts, the points will be awarded using “Cancellation Scoring”.“Cancellation Scoring” = The points of one player cancel out the points of the opponent. (Example: If the blue team scores 5 points and the green team scores 2 points then the blue team wins the round with 3 points.)Any Popdart that does not suction to the surface is considered a dead dart and will remain in play until the end of the round.Land on the Wigglenobber Target Marker = 10 pointsClosest Popdart that sticks = 3 PointsEach other Popdart that sticks = 1 PointWigglenobber- When one Popdarts lands on top of another Popdarts. This is worth double the points of the Popdart that it lands on no matter what color.The player that was awarded points in the previous round begins the next round by selecting the next Target Marker location. Each game consists of multiple rounds. Games are played to 21 points. First to 21 wins.

About Us

Meet the Carman brothers and their families. Josh and Jason Carman grew up in Pennsylvania, graduated college and went on to establish their careers in finance and business. They are Christ-followers who enjoy the outdoors, sports, travel, food and spending time with family and friends. From a young age they have been active in sports and seemed to turn everything into a fun and competitive game. Flash forward a few years to 2020 and nothing has really changed! When many of us adjusted to the life of quarantine, Josh did what he has always done and created fun games out of nothing which is how Popdarts originated. After coming up with an initial prototype & establishing the game play, Josh & Jason set off on this journey with help from friends and family to make Popdarts what it is today.

OUR MISSION

In a world that isolates us with devices, we bring you a game that brings friends and family of all ages together, fuels creativity and challenges abilities!

WHY CHOOSE POPDARTS? In a world that isolates us with devices, we bring you a game that brings friends and family of all ages together, fuels creativity and challenges abilities!
WHAT’S INCLUDED IN A SET? 3 Blue/Green Swirled Popdarts | 3 Purple/Yellow Popdarts | 1 Orange Wigglenobber Target Marker | 1 Mesh Carrying Bag with rules printed right on the bag
WHERE CAN I PLAY? Our compact sets can be played wherever you go, indoors or outdoors. Popdarts stick best to smooth surfaces like a countertop, refrigerator, window, car windshield, glass door, surfboard – be creative!
HOW DO YOU SCORE? The closest Popdart to the Target Marker = 3 points. Every other Popdart that sticks = 1 point. Landing on the Wigglenobber Target Marker = 10 points.Use “Cancellation Scoring” (just like cornhole). For example: 5 blue – 2 green = 3 blue. Each game consists of multiple rounds! First team to reach 21 points wins!






Popdarts Pro Pack
Popdarts Original Pack
Popdarts Expansion Pack
Popdarts Glow Pack
Popdart Color 3 Blue/Green Swirl | 3 Purple/Yellow 3 Blue | 3 Green 3 Purple | 3 Yellow 3 Blue (Glow) | 3 Green (Glow)

Popdarts Decal

Ruler printed on the carrying bag
✓

DETERMINE WHO GOES FIRST

  • Rock, Paper Scissors to determine who goes first.
  • The winner chooses the first Target Marker location and the color of their team’s Popdarts.
  • There are three Popdarts per player and they are made of a different color to distinguish between players.
  • The game is played with two or more players.

CALL YOUR SHOT

  • To start a game, player one chooses a location with a smooth surface and places the Target Marker.
  • Player one also calls the round parameters.
  • Example: Player one places Target Marker on the countertop and says, “Throw standing from behind the couch.”

TAKE TURNS THROWING

  • Once the parameters are set, the player that placed the Target Marker throws the first Popdart.
  • The players rotate throwing their Popdarts with the objective of landing on the Wigglenobber Target Marker or at least getting the closest to the Wigglnobber Target Marker.
  • This continues until both players have thrown all their Popdarts.

HOW TO SCORE A ROUND

  • After both players have thrown all their Popdarts, the points will be awarded using “Cancellation Scoring”.
  • “Cancellation Scoring” = The points of one player cancel out the points of the opponent. (Example: If the blue team scores 5 points and the green team scores 2 points then the blue team wins the round with 3 points.)
  • Any Popdart that does not suction to the surface is considered a dead dart and will remain in play until the end of the round.
  • Land on the Wigglenobber Target Marker = 10 points
  • Closest Popdart that sticks = 3 Points
  • Each other Popdart that sticks = 1 Point
  • Wigglenobber- When one Popdarts lands on top of another Popdarts. This is worth double the points of the Popdart that it lands on no matter what color.
  • The player that was awarded points in the previous round begins the next round by selecting the next Target Marker location. Each game consists of multiple rounds. Games are played to 21 points. First to 21 wins.

Read more

About Us

Meet the Carman brothers and their families. Josh and Jason Carman grew up in Pennsylvania, graduated college and went on to establish their careers in finance and business. They are Christ-followers who enjoy the outdoors, sports, travel, food and spending time with family and friends. From a young age they have been active in sports and seemed to turn everything into a fun and competitive game. Flash forward a few years to 2020 and nothing has really changed! When many of us adjusted to the life of quarantine, Josh did what he has always done and created fun games out of nothing which is how Popdarts originated. After coming up with an initial prototype & establishing the game play, Josh & Jason set off on this journey with help from friends and family to make Popdarts what it is today.

OUR MISSION

In a world that isolates us with devices, we bring you a game that brings friends and family of all ages together, fuels creativity and challenges abilities!
